title: Completed PE Summary - Legend
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Charter International
Flag: UK
Type: Motor vessel/Dive support
Length overall: .01
Gross tonnage: 0.01
Date & Time 29/06/02 09:45
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Flooding/Foundering
Persons onboard: 2 Crew 10 Passengers
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Contstructive total loss

Synopsis

The vessel was carrying 10 divers, when flooding was discovered. The vessel sank whilst on its way back to harbour. All personnel were rescued.

Action taken:

No recommendations were made as a result of this investigation.

However, MCA conducted their own enquiries into the incident, resulting in changes to the concessions/ exemptions granted to vessels which predated the required Code of Practice.
